title: Great Pretender: Razbliuto
synopsis:
Presumed dead, master con artist and recovering amnesiac Dorothy is discovered by Shanghai Longu-bang, a mob who wants payback for her conning them. With no memories and nowhere to go, she must rely on a local crime underboss to elude Taipeiâ€™s criminal underworld all while tracking down leads to her mysterious past.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
